Nightlight/Windlord::

Windlord flew around, looking for his friends or Recon.

Nightlight heard Aerotaur's voice and walked in beast mode, 
caitously, she arrived she arrived where the voice came.

"Aerotaur???" said Nightlight while she tried to find him.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Johnny Brennan" <thejerkyboysare@h...> wrote:
> Recon transformed back to his robot mode and continued to fly, but 
then he 
> stopped in mid air. "Wait a second. Aerotaur and burning hammer 
were 
> fighting like mortal enemies the first time I showed up. Now 
they're on the 
> same side? How is this possible," Recon asked.
>
